description: Energy storage containers with Lithium Ion batteries (R) are seen at the University of California San Diego on September 16, 2022 in La Jolla, California. - The battery storage system is one of the largest, most environmentally-friendly, battery-based energy storage systems in the nation. The 2.5 megawatt (MW), 5 megawatt-hour (MWh) systemenough to power 2,500 homeswill be integrated into the universitys microgrid, which generates 92 percent of the electricity used on campus annually and is considered one of the worlds most advanced microgrids.
